DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date a very thin slice (of tissue or mineral or other substance) for examination under a microscope.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A very thin slice (of tissue or mineral or other substance) for examination under a microscope.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ part that consists of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to specific spatial relationships; together with other tissues, it constitutes an organ component. Example(s): epithelium, muscle(tissue), connective tissue, neural tissue, lymphoid tissue.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A very thin slice (of tissue or mineral or other substance) for examination under a microscope.

Concepts.definition: A very thin slice (of tissue or mineral or other substance) for examination under a microscope.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
